item.title: About
item.description: About Hi there! My name is Hussem Ben Belgacem. I’m 24 and I started programming at the age of 12. I’m now a freshly graduated Computer Science Engineer. My speciality is Data Science & Artificial Intelligence and I’m also really confortable with Software Engineering. I currently speak fluently French, English, C++ and Python. I also have notions in Arabic and German. In my spare time I like to play video games, watch movies/tv shows and I also like to play the guitar.
